skillTree.name: Dark Steed
skillTree.description: True horses no longer, Dark Magic corrupts the finest Elven steeds and turns them into black-flanked killers.

skillTree.name: Cold One
skillTree.description: Dark, feral beasts indigenous to Naggaroth, tempted from their damp, warm caves to bear the Druchii to battle.

skillTree.name: Dark Pegasus
skillTree.description: The corrupted Dark Pegasi fly south from the Chaos Wastes to Naggaroth's Iron Mountains to make their nests.

skillTree.name: Manticore
skillTree.description: The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.

skillTree.name: Black Dragon
skillTree.description: Secretly nurtured by Malekith, Black Dragons are enchanted with Dark Magic that corrupts and enhances.

skillTree.name: Hekarti's Blessing
skillTree.description: It is easy to favour Hekarti - who pays close attention to Elven desires - over Atharti, but only the foolish allow that to happen.

skillTree.name: Ward of Khaine
skillTree.description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hekarti
skillTree.description: Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Martial Name of Power
skillTree.description: This one has adopted a warrior name to strike fear into enemy hearts, a moniker backed up by their deeds in battle.

effects.description: Choose a Name of Power that improves the Characters's own combat skills

skillTree.name: Revered Name of Power
skillTree.description: This one's chosen name is muttered in hushed tones, reflecting as it does their vile proclivities.

effects.description: Choose a Name of Power that improves the Lord's army

skillTree.name: Aristocratic Name of Power
skillTree.description: Some family names are best forgotten; others are worthy of resurrection, as they engender fear and respect among the masses.

effects.description: Choose a Name of Power that influences the province in which Lord is standing or the faction as a whole

skillTree.name: Student of the Dark Tower
skillTree.description: The ancient archives of Ghrond contain secrets that can preserve life - or annihilate it.

ui_effects.description: âž• Medium, forward-moving area of effect

skillTree.name: Dark Revelry
skillTree.description: Come attendants, and summon the congregation.

effects.description: Attrition: +10% casualties suffered from Chaos territory attrition
Physical resistance: +5% for Pleasure Cultists units
Weapon strength: +10% for Pleasure Cultists units

skillTree.name: Demonic Influence
skillTree.description: The winds blow unpredictably around the Supreme Sorceress; a result, no doubt, of her dark dealings.

skillTree.name: Hollow Souls
skillTree.description: The Warlocks and Medusae are, for different reasons, under the yoke of the Dark Prince, much to the delight of the Supreme Sorceress.

effects.description: Ward save: 5% for Doomfire Warlocks and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Weapon strength: +5% for Doomfire Warlocks and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Ward save: 10% for Doomfire Warlocks and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Weapon strength: +10% for Doomfire Warlocks and Bloodwrack Medusae units

skillTree.name: Fierce Competition
skillTree.description: Her sisters are wildly jealous of Morathi's favour. The Supreme Sorceress must stay several steps ahead of their treachery.

skillTree.name: Daemon's Pact
skillTree.description: A bargain struck to ensure the health and vigour of her soldiers.

skillTree.name: Sorcerous Foresight
skillTree.description: A technique perfected by Morathi, and taught in a lesser fashion to her most promising students.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2% for all spells

skillTree.name: Raucous Celebrations
skillTree.description: It wouldn't be a Druchii party if everyone was still alive at its conclusion.

skillTree.name: Secrets of the Enigmatic
skillTree.description: Show me more.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%

skillTree.name: Occult Trafficking
skillTree.description: Within the tight-knit group of Morathi's inner circle, secrets and knowledge are valuable commodities to be traded.

skillTree.name: Wyssan's Wildform
skillTree.description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Amber Spear
skillTree.description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

ui_effects.description: âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Wild Heart
skillTree.description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.

ui_effects.description: âž• Increase to power reserves by 10
âž• Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 13 seconds

skillTree.name: Flock of Doom
skillTree.description: With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.description: âž• 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
âž– High chance opponent will resist damage
âž– Weak vs a single combatant
âž• 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
âž– High chance opponent will resist damage
âž– Weak vs a single combatant
âž• 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
âž– High chance opponent will resist damage
âž– Weak vs a single combatant
âž• 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
âž– High chance opponent will resist damage
âž– Weak vs a single combatant
âž• 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
âž– High chance opponent will resist damage
âž– Weak vs a single combatant

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Pann's Impenetrable Pelt
skillTree.description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: The Curse of Anraheir
skillTree.description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Transformation of Kadon
skillTree.description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Manticore, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.description: âž• Powerful unit ideal for combat
âž– Summoned units degrade over time
âž– Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: âž• Increase to power reserves by 30
âž• Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 20 seconds

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Line Breaker
skillTree.description: Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

effects.description: Melee defence: +2 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
Melee attack: +4 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
Melee defence: +4 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
Melee attack: +6 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
Melee defence: +6 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units

skillTree.name: Sheafmaster
skillTree.description: Marshalling missile troops effectively - even elites - is all about timing.

effects.description: Ammunition: +8% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
Ammunition: +12% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
Reload time reduction: +7% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Bolt Thrower units
Ammunition: +20% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Bolt Thrower units

skillTree.name: Raid Leader
skillTree.description: The most effective raiders have a plan that is certain to succeed and stick to it; this one ensures that they do.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +5 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Missile strength: +5% for Shades, Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Melee defence: +4 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlock and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Charge bonus: +10 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Missile strength: +10% for Shades, Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Melee defence: +6 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlock and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Charge bonus: +20 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units

skillTree.name: Lash Master
skillTree.description: Judicious, or even not-so-judicious, use of the lash tends to get the desired results, so why hold back?

effects.description: Weapon strength: +3% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Weapon strength: +5% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Charge bonus: +10 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Reload time reduction: +5% for Bloodwrack Medusae units
Weapon strength: +10% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Charge bonus: +20 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Bloodwrack Medusae units

skillTree.name: Knight Lord
skillTree.description: The ability to command the savage, untamed Cold Ones should not be underestimated - not everyone has the knack!

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Melee attack: +4 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Melee defence: +4 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Melee attack: +6 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Melee defence: +6 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units

skillTree.name: Slaughterlord
skillTree.description: An elite even amongst elites, this accomplished warrior directs the cut-and-thrust of melee - a choreographer of death, you might say.

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
Melee attack: +4 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
Melee defence: +4 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
Melee attack: +6 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
Melee defence: +6 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units

skillTree.name: Cull the Unworthy
skillTree.description: Those who fail to make the grade don't just die, they're tortured and used for target practice!

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile strength: +10% for Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +10 for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Ravager Rewards
skillTree.description: You'd think that pillaging the land would bring payment enough. You'd be wrong.

effects.description: Speed: +15% for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Range: +15% for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +10 for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Favour the Fortunate
skillTree.description: The gods help those who help themselves - raising them above the rank and file to elite status.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15 for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +10% for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +5 for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Confer Bloodlust
skillTree.description: The murderous, unforgiving rage of Khaine can be transferred from a Lord to his legions.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
Speed: +15% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
Physical resistance: +10% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Dreaded Slaver
skillTree.description: This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Infamous Raider
skillTree.description: If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Fleeting Shadow
skillTree.description: Knowing precisely where and when to launch an ambush, and against who, takes an unusual level of guile.

skillTree.name: Elven Healing
skillTree.description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description: Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Cruel
backgroundSkills.description: To cause another's suffering, to delight in their pain, to extend their agony according to your whim. That is power.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Malevolent
backgroundSkills.description: Evil-minded, poisonous malignancy. For its own sake.

backgroundSkills.name: Malicious
backgroundSkills.description: When this one is abroad you can be sure that malice is borne towards anyone and everyone.

effects.description: Construction cost: -25% for Cult of Khaine or Cult of Pleasure buildings
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Death Hags

backgroundSkills.name: Spiteful
backgroundSkills.description: Behind every thought they have - and every deed - is shameless, full-blooded spite.

backgroundSkills.name: Vicious
backgroundSkills.description: "Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

ui_effects.description: âž• 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
âž– High chance opponent will resist damage
âž– Weak vs a single combatant

backgroundSkills.name: Ambush Master
backgroundSkills.description: From shadows we came...

backgroundSkills.name: Blood of Asur
backgroundSkills.description: They will pay for what should be ours!

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against High Elves
Leadership: +5 when fighting against High Elves

backgroundSkills.name: Harpies of Naggarond
backgroundSkills.description: Deadly and fast as northern wind.

backgroundSkills.name: Shadows of Naggarond
backgroundSkills.description: They don't need armour to kill their enemies. Bloody!

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 for Shades and Dark Riders units
Armour: -5 for Shades and Dark Riders units

backgroundSkills.name: Tyrant
backgroundSkills.description: They will tremble... You too, in time...

backgroundSkills.name: First Strike
backgroundSkills.description: For Khaine!
